code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Header from'../Header/Header';import Footer from'../Footer/Footer';import EventBox from'./EventBox';import styles from'./acceuil.module.css';import gauche from'./gauche.png';import droite from'./droite.png';import Slide3 from'./Slide1.png';import Slide2 from'./Slide2.png';import Slide1 from'./Slide3.png';import Slide4 from'./Slide4.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Acceuil=()=>{const images=[Slide1,Slide2,Slide3,Slide4];const[currentSlide,setCurrentSlide]=useState(0);const nextSlide=()=>{setCurrentSlide(prevSlide=>(prevSlide+1)%images.length);};const prevSlide=()=>{setCurrentSlide(prevSlide=>prevSlide===0?images.length-1:prevSlide-1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.sliderContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"Previous Slide",src:gauche,className:styles.arrow,onClick:prevSlide}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.slider,children:images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:`Slide ${index+1}`,className:`${styles.slideImage} ${index===currentSlide?styles.active:''}`},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"Next Slide",src:droite,className:styles.arrow,onClick:nextSlide})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Nos Evenements "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventBox,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Acceuil;
